Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1313.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Lower Level, Gladiator Maintenance Area', 2: 'Everett Arena'}
{3: 'Everett Arena, Lower Level, Gladiator Maintenance Area'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Serra should be sleeping, but instead she slips through the darkness and creeps silently down to the mechanoid maintenance area at the lowest level of the arena.'}
{3: 'She didn\'t even bring Hammer—her normally inseparable companion—with her. She came alone—because she came to fulfill her "promise" with Veronica.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1311.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Veronica', 3: 'Stop drowning in your childish fantasies and waiting to "fly away from this place"...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: 'Come find me when you snap out of that.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1313.jpg'}
{3: "To her surprise, Veronica hasn't powered down for the night—apparently having been waiting for Serra to arrive all along."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Veronica', 3: "You've come.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: "I thought I'd be waiting much longer for you to show up.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Serra', 3: 'A promise is a promise, yeah? And I came because I know how to answer your question from the other day.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: "And I've made preparations for it, too.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: 'What preparations?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: 'We can\'t talk here... Actually, I\'d rather go somewhere else. Whenever I\'m down here, all I can think about is "work"... My mind just goes blank.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Looking puzzled, Veronica stares at Serra, unsure why she's beating around the bush."}
{2: 'Serra', 3: "Oh, why so serious... I'm just kidding around.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: 'Shall we go? We can head anywhere you want, but just for a little while. How about we go and check out that "simulated sky dome" I told you about?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Serra smiles, her fingers in her pocket brushing against the item she created alongside the anti-interference chip.'}
{3: "Veronica doesn't answer. The hanging silence makes Serra feel awkward again and wonder if she's said something wrong."}
{2: 'Serra', 3: "I mean, if you're not interested, then...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'But Veronica stands up, grabs Serra firmly by the wrist, and pulls her along without a word.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory833.jpg'}
{3: 'Veronica moves with quick yet steady steps, keeping Serra close to the walls as they proceed. At each corner, she cautiously looks up to check for security cameras.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1312.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1312.jpg'}
{3: 'Their footsteps echo through the empty hallways until they come to a halt before the security door leading to the uppermost level.'}
{3: "The security door to the sky dome looms before them, its red light glowing to indicate it's locked."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Veronica, completely unconcerned, readies herself to take down the door with her razor-sharp claws literally, but Serra quickly stops her.'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: "Wait, that's gonna cause a scene.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'She pulls out a touch panel, connects it to the security system, and lets her fingers fly away on the keyboard.'}
{2: 'Access Control', 3: 'Employee ID verified. Access granted.'}
{3: 'The security system lets out a crisp electronic beep as the red lock indicator switches to green. Serra flashes a smug smile at Veronica.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Serra', 3: "Told ya they ain't got nothing on me.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1025.jpg'}
{1: '1003', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1110.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '0.4', 5: '0'}
{1: 'Top Level, Simulated Sky Dome', 2: 'Everett Arena'}
{3: 'Everett Arena, Top Level, Simulated Sky Dome'}

{3: "An extraordinary sight unfolds before them. In this top-level area—forbidden to ordinary spectators—the simulated sky dome continuously cycles through day, night, and seasonal changes as it's been programmed to."}
{3: 'At this moment, the dome displays a deep, dark night sky that hangs overhead like a velvet curtain, studded with countless stars that shimmer like brilliant jewels.'}
{3: 'Serra gazes up in excitement at the starry expanse, her eyes showing the twinkling lights.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Serra', 3: 'This is breathtaking!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Meanwhile, Veronica quietly moves to the side, sits down, and gazes up at the simulated starscape.'}
{3: 'She seems to have left some space next to herself on purpose, a silent invitation for Serra to join her.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Serra quietly sits down beside her. She carefully avoids the long tail that Veronica has casually draped nearby.'}
{3: 'The faint yet gentle starlight from the simulated sky bathes everything in a subtle, cool glow.'}
{3: 'Serra can sense that something gentle is quietly beginning to bloom under the tough front Veronica has been putting up.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Veronica', 3: "Why did you take me here? What is it you couldn't say back there that you can say here?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: "Well, I just wanted to spend the day with a friend because it's my birthday...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The girl glances sideways at the mechanoid, who keeps her gaze at the starry expanse without objecting to being called a "friend."'}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: 'Birthday?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: 'A birthday is like a mechanoid\'s "Activation Date"... Veronica, do you remember your Activation Date?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: "I do. It's meaningless, though.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: 'On my Activation Date, I woke up in the lowest level of this arena, and the rest is history.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: "Well, whether it's a birthday or an Activation Date, it should be special... And check out this little bird here. Today will be its Activation Date.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'With it, Serra retrieves a mechanical bird drone—a gift from Uncle Roko—from the toolbox at her feet and carefully wipes away the traces of oil from its shell.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5901_3.jpg'}
{3: 'With delicate movements on the controller, Serra guides the crude-looking mechanical bird as it slowly rises and hovers above their heads.'}
{3: 'The bird spreads its wings in flight, its silver-white shell reflecting the simulated starlight and scattering tiny specks of light over both Serra and Veronica.'}
{3: 'Veronica offers no response. Her gaze shifts away from the vast simulated starscape, transfixed on the mechanical bird with its outstretched wings.'}
{3: "The mechanical bird's metal wings may look crude, yet they still lift the bird gracefully through the air."}
{3: 'She looks quietly at the "bird," lost in thought for who knows how long, until a sound she\'s never heard before breaks her reverie.'}
{3: 'The mechanical bird makes another weird noise.'}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: '...It stopped. Is it broken?'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: "Not at all! That was just the drone's shutter sound. It's hovering up to take pictures of us."}
{2: 'Serra', 3: "Geez, we're taking a photo. Not even a smile for the camera? Are you always this serious? I don't think I've ever seen you actually smile..."}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: 'A photo?'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: 'Yes, here, check this out.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg5901_16.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryQujingkuang.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1003', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront30.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.8', 5: '0'}
{3: 'Serra extends the controller in her hand toward Veronica. On its small display screen is a still image.'}
{3: 'The two sit side by side, bathed in the gentle glow of the simulated starlight.'}
{3: "Serra's face beams with a radiant smile, while the mechanoid maintains her usual serious expression. Yet their gazes are fixed on the same point in the distance."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Serra', 3: "I bet you'd look beautiful if you smiled!", 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Veronica', 3: "...I'm not gonna do that.", 4: '18'}
{3: "Sounding as cold as ever, Veronica, however, doesn't strike Serra as mean anymore."}
{3: 'In that fleeting moment, Serra senses that something between them has quietly shifted.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryQujingkuang.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1025.jpg'}
{1: '1003', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1110.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '0.4', 5: '0'}
{3: "Under Serra's control, the mechanical bird gently descends and comes to rest on Veronica's hand."}
{3: 'Veronica quietly holds the seemingly weightless mechanical bird, while Serra carefully examines the photo they just took on the tiny display screen.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Serra', 3: 'Hey Veronica, what do you think about changing the background of our photo to a field of flowers under sunset?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: 'Just like... the painting on the wall in my room.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: "...I don't really care. The people in it will still look the same anyway.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Instead of arguing, Serra rises to her feet, spreads her arms wide under the canopy of simulated stars, and closes her eyes.'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: 'Veronica, have you ever imagined what it would be like to stand in a real field of flowers?', 4: '2'}
{3: "Without waiting for Veronica's answer, Serra keeps going, as if eager to pour out every thought swirling inside her mind."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Serra', 3: 'I do! I dream about it every single night.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: 'I imagine lying in a meadow blooming with flowers and watching clouds drift across the sky without a care in the world, until the sun slowly sinks below the horizon.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: "The sunset warming your face must feel so gentle and soothing, don't you think?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: "And I'd pick handfuls of flowers to weave into a wreath on my head.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: "I could do anything I wanted, with no schedule to follow. I'd stay there as long as I pleased.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: "No missions to rush through. And Overseer isn't going to tell me what to do there.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: "And then... I'd take another photo with you against that sunset, Veronica.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: 'With a smile on your face, of course!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: "Serra eagerly returns to Veronica's side and sits a little closer to her than before."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiActivityBriefBase/FxUiActivityBriefShining02.prefab', 2: '2', 5: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiActivityBriefBase/FxUiActivityBriefShining02.prefab', 5: '2'}
{3: 'On the simulated sky dome above, stars sparkle brilliantly against the backdrop. A virtual shooting star streaks across the display, as though sealing the secret promise shared between them.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Serra', 3: 'I wonder what it would be like if you could grow wings, just like this mechanical bird drone?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Serra holds up the mechanical bird drone, lost in thought.'}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: "...I'm not exactly built for flying.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: "Hmm, that's true... Let me try to imagine what you'd look like with wings...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Serra stares intently at Veronica, deep in thought.'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: "Ah, there. You'd look like a dragon!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Veronica', 3: 'Dragon?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: 'Yes! When I was little, I saw pictures of dragons in a storybook—the kind with wings and long tails.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: "If your frame had a pair of wings on it, you'd look so cool—just like a dragon!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: 'Here, let me show you what it looks like.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1004', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '0.7', 5: '0.3'}
{3: 'Right away, Serra kneels down and, with the thin layer of dust on the ground as her "canvas," starts drawing away with a finger.'}
{3: 'As her finger moves across the dust, a simple sketch takes shape before them and slowly grows as details are added to it.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'First, from what she remembers, Serra sketches a winged dragon with a long tail, then adds a drawing of Veronica beside it.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Serra', 3: "There... this is what it's like for now, and then we aDD a few more things to it...", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: "So, what do you think? Looks just like you, doesn't it?", 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 3: 'In the sketch, Veronica has a pair of "wings" sprouting from her back.'}
{3: "Though crude, the sketch in the dust captures something essential—a heroic figure that bears little resemblance to Veronica's usual demeanor."}
{3: 'With wings spread out, horns rising from her hair, and a long tail trailing behind, she truly resembles a dragon ready for battle.'}
{3: 'Lance in hand, she stands as a conquering warrior—to be stopped by nothing in her way.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1316.jpg'}
{1: 'Lower Level, Staff Quarters', 2: 'Everett Arena'}
{3: 'Everett Arena, Lower Level, Staff Quarters'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Excited, Serra hops toward her room, treasuring the "secret promise" they made. Despite the fact that it\'s almost dawn, not a trace of fatigue shows on her face.'}
{3: 'She hums happily to herself, while the wing-shaped pendant dances lightly around her neck.'}
{1: '1005', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.3'}
{3: "Suddenly, footsteps echo from the end of the corridor, making her start with alarm—there shouldn't be any human staff around at this hour."}
{1: '1005', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0.3'}
{1: '1', 3: "Before she can duck into a corner, a figure appears in her line of sight. Serra only lets out a sigh of relief when she sees that it's Uncle Roko."}
{3: 'When their eyes meet, he shows a flash of surprise, but quickly masks it.'}
{3: "Serra finds it weird to see Roko here at this time because work doesn't start for him for another few hours."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Serra', 3: 'Huh? Uncle Roko, what are you... doing here so early?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roko', 3: 'Oh... ran out of medicine. Been feeling awful—this cough is keeping me up all night, so I thought a walk might help... Cough, cough...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: 'Hey, are you really alright—Wait, before I forgot, here, this is for you!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: "I traded in some of my work hours for this medicine! Take it for now. I'll get you more later!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Serra', 3: "Ah, I'm getting sleepy now. Better catch some rest before my shift starts. Give me a shout if I'm not up in time, alright?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Serra waves goodbye and skips away, her light footsteps fading down the corridor.'}
